entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
